content: p to 1 st before m k1 sm p to last 3 sts k3 to last 3 sts k3 repeat r13 & 14 four more times repeat row 4 & 5 four more times repeat entire slip-stitch and 33 sts stockinette band section 5 more times repeat r1 through r12 once more slip-stitch and 321 sts stockinette band section rib section i suggest weaving in ends as you go throughout the project see link on rib section is knit in mc yo k to before m p1 k1 m1r sm k1 m1l 1 st before m yo k1 yo sm k1 k1 p1 k2 to last 5 sts p1 k1 m1l yo k1 yo k to last 4 sts yo k1 k3 4 sts increased yo k3 8 sts increased caro in the city © 2026 page 4 r4 k3 p2 k1 to m sm p2 k1 to last 5 sts p2 k3 r5 k3 m1r k2 p1 to 2 sts before m k2 m1r sm k1 m1l k2 p1 to last 5 sts k2 m1l k3 4 sts increased r6 k4 p2 k1 to 4 sts before m p3 k1 sm p3 k1 p2 to last 4 sts k4 r7 same as r1 r8 same as r2 r9 same as r3 r10 same as r4 r11 same as r5 r12 same as r6 345 sts break mc rolled edge join cc r1 rs k3 m1r k to m m1r sm k1 m1l k to last 3 sts m1l k3 4 sts increased r2 p all sts r3 loosely bobble all sts finishing weave in any leftover ends trim ends gently block to finished measurements enjoy caro in the city © 2026 page 5 guide to abbreviations term definition bobble bind off cc contrast color co cast on k knit m marker m1l left-leaning increase m1r right-leaning increase mc main color p purl pm place marker ptbl purl through back loop pu&k pick up a stitch and knit it sm slip marker caro in the city © 2026 page 6 slwyib slip the stated number of stitches purlwise with yarn in back slwyif slip the stated number of stitches purlwise with yarn
